channel.title: Buttons
channel.description:
Ok so I have this problem, I'm using Project Czar v1.2. (A problem to itself) but on the Player Controls page, where emotes are supposed to be they have been modified to teleports ect.
[URL=http://img222.imageshack.us/my.php?image=servervw8.png][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/8661/servervw8.th.png[/img][/URL]
I've been able to modify the first one to PK which was 'Home'. But when I search for 'Jad' in client.java, it's not there :S. So I have no idea what's going on.
Thanks, oroN

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

[quote=“Torque`, post:7, topic:251760”][quote author=D T 55 link=topic=332377.msg2593162#msg2593162 date=1229871580]

If Project Czar has a class that handles the text, then search inside of there.

Sorry i read that wrong i thought you said project czar doesn’t have texthandler.

not quite…
[/quote]

Not quite what? I haven’t ever seen the code from this server so I’m just going from what information you and the person asking the question has given me. Explain what you mean by ‘not quite’.[/quote]

I thought you said Czar doesn’t use texthandler, i read it to fast.

Read full topic
